## Site Information

- **Language**: en-US ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸
- **Base URL**: https://pagliacii.github.io/hugo-bearberry/
- **Last Updated**: 2025-10-18

- en-US ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ (en-US)

- zh-CN ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ (zh-CN)


## Technical Features

This site uses:
- Hugo Static Site Generator
- Bear Berry theme
- Math rendering support (KaTeX/MathJax)
- Diagram support (Mermaid, Kroki)
- Multilingual content support
- RSS feeds
- Syntax highlighting
